AsyncTrigger.trigger

Function/Meaning
Pulls the trigger
Type
Method of the AsyncTrigger class
Syntax
trigger()
Arguments
None
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Triggers an event.
After calling this method, control returns to the Kirikiri core. When the Kirikiri core reaches the stage of delivering accumulated asynchronous events, the AsyncTrigger.onFire event occurs.
